comment.body:
CIA routing all the traffick and putting a intranet to their own internet mirror's into victim's computers.
I realized of this long time ago. but there was nothing I could do about it. it happened to me.
Emails saying they were sent, but actually not.
When using good VPN providers internet contents appear Updated. 
When they log your activities, they create a intranet mirror and place it instead of your normal internet. then for most you try, you can't actually get out of it. since it's beyond your PC settings.
How to free of it, if you think you are victim?.
1.-Buy a New computer.
2.-Configure it in new network or public network.
3.-Buy Antivirus with firewall.
4.-use a VPN since your first time.
5.-Login only with Tor above the VPN to sites like twitter and facebook.
6.-Keep everything normal.
7.-Join the ZeroNet.... (Without VPN the Zero Net is blocked from updating. Warning!!).
